head.supplied: 25/11/90 ¶ ¶ Allow me to say, dear Mr Thomas, that the quarto-work on the Salsolaceous plants ¶ is now ready as far as to the sixth decade inclusive, so that it would be desirable, to send it out so...

div.p: P90/4198 unit 246, VPRS 1163/P1 inward correspondence files, VA 672 Premier's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Allow me to say, dear Mr Thomas, that the quarto-work on the Salsolaceous plants
B89.13.04 and B90.13.14. is now ready as far as to the sixth decade inclusive, so that it would be desirable, to send it out soon through the public Library. Will you with your usual attentiveness place the list of proposed recipients
See M to T. Wilson, 16 September 1890. before the Prime Minister for his views on the subject.
Thomas, as Secretary to the Premier, referred this to Thomas Bride, Librarian of the Public Library, who replied on 7 May 1891 that 'the works have been distributed' according to the list of recipients given to him.
